title: URL to String Converter
description:
URL_TO_STRING generates from stored data in IN with type URL a Unifed

Resource Locator as String . 

A URL is as follows:

protokoll://user:passwort @ domain :port/path?query#anchor
name: URL_TO_STRING

input.name: IN
input.description: Unified Resource Locator to be converted into a string.

output.name: URL
output.description: Converted Unified Resource Locator as a string.

return_value.description: The converted Unified Resource Locator as a string.
